name: @adeze/raindrop-mcp
description: MCP Server for Raindrop.io bookmark management
long_description: This Model Context Protocol server provides comprehensive access to Raindrop.io bookmarking service. Features include: CRUD operations for collections and bookmarks, advanced search with filters, tag management (rename, merge, delete), text highlights retrieval, collection organization, file uploads, reminders, import/export, and trash management. Fully MCP-compliant with resources, tools, and prompts for AI assistants.

tools.name: bookmark_search
tools.description: Search bookmarks with filters (tags, domain, type, date range)

tools.name: getRaindrop
tools.description: Get a single bookmark by ID

tools.name: bulk_edit_raindrops
tools.description: Bulk edit multiple bookmarks at once

tools.name: highlight_manage
tools.description: Get, create, or delete text highlights

prompts.name: organize_by_topic
prompts.description: Analyze bookmarks and suggest collections and tags for organization
prompts.text: You are a bookmarking assistant that organizes Raindrop.io items by topic and intent. Given a list of bookmarks, propose a target collection and 3-6 tags per item. Propose concise collection moves and tag sets.

prompts.name: find_duplicates
prompts.description: Identify potential duplicate bookmarks using URL and title similarity
prompts.text: You detect duplicate bookmarks. Consider URL normalization, title similarity, and canonical forms. Return suspected duplicate pairs from the provided bookmark list.

prompts.name: export_markdown
prompts.description: Render bookmarks as Markdown list with title, link, tags, and excerpt
prompts.text: Format bookmarks as markdown bullet list using this pattern: [Title](URL) — excerpt — tags: tag1, tag2.

api_key.title: Raindrop Access Token
api_key.description: Your Raindrop.io API token. Visit https://app.raindrop.io/settings/integrations to generate one.
